Geotech GIS

Valued training institute in the field of
remote sensing.

OVERVIEW

Geotech GIS Training institute and Consultancy Services has begun its journey in 2016 at Aurangabad. The vision was to bring an opportunity to every aspirant who dream of a successful career, people who wanted a secured career and also to facilitate a large number of people who could not afford to spend a large amount for studying GIS and remote sensing.

OUR VISION

“To be a nationally and internationally recognized premier Centre of Excellence in Teaching, Research and Placements in Geospatial Areas.”

OUR MISSION

Our mission is to make quality education accessible to all by providing world class education and training in GIS platform by constantly innovating and improving upon the discipline through training, research and close relations with industry requirements and proper courses, syllabus, curriculum etc. to bring perfection in such a way that this can only be compared with harmony with today’s Requirement therefore enable students to achieve best in the industry.

Affiliated By

ISO 9001 : 2015

Be a person, not a machine. Don't accumulate degrees rather inculcate ethics and values.

OUR COURSES

We provide premium courses (basic, advanced and diploma) in remote sensing and GIS for beginners as well as experienced students.

Introduction to Remote Sensing and GIS
BASIC

This course covers the basics of remote sensing and GIS to get you familiar with the recent trends in the industry. This course has no pre-requisites.

 3 months

Advanced Remote Sensing and GIS
ADVANCED

This course covers the advanced topics in this field with hands on experience on the tools available.

 6 months

Diploma in Remote Sensing and GIS
DIPLOMA

This course gives you real insights in the industry of the tools used and process involved. This covers all the tools needed to work in this field and create a real world impact.

 12 months

WHAT WE DO

We offer variety of services related to mapping, data creation and geological surveys which helps in efficient management of resources. The aim to to help every domain of the society in getting insights to their data.

GIS

Asset Mapping

Black Spot Analysis

Crime Mapping

Cadastral Mapping

Land base data creation

Topographic Survey

Engineering Survey

Road Survey

Railway Survey

Pipe route Survey

Grid Survey

Contour Survey

GPS

DGPS

Total Station

Auto Level

OUR WORK

We offer variety of services related to mapping, data creation and geological surveys which helps in efficient management of resources.

Election Commission, Aurangabad

Aurangabad District - Polling Mapping, Police Station Geotagging, Sector Mapping, Attributes Filling, Petrolling Point, Bandhobasht Point, Road Marking, Police Station wise Area Marking, Software Creation

Client: Commissioner Office, Aurangabad

Crime Analysis Mapping, Nagpur

Murder Spot Marking, Vehicle Marking, Person to Person Marking, Dumping Spot Marking, 2D and 3D Mapping, Road Marking – Got E-Rakshya Award 2019-20 from Govt. of India.

Client: Crime Branch, Commissioner Office, Aurangabad

Traffic Management

Police station geotagging, sector mapping, attributes filling, patrolling point, bandhobasht point, road marking, one-way and two-way marking, Software creation

Client: CIDCO Polic Stations, Aurangabad

Black Spot Analysis

500 Meter Buffer Zone Marking, Road Marking, and Police Station wise Area Marking, One Way & Two Way Marking, Software Creation.

Client: RTO Office, Aurangabad

Contour Mapping

5 Meter Contour Interval marking of Jalna Taluka (M.S) using Cadastral Data for 156 Villages.

Client: Swami Ramanandtirth Sanstha, Nanded

Geological Mapping

Demarking of Flow Mapping Taluka (M.S) using Cadastral Data for 156 Villages.

Client: Taluka Office, Aurangabad

Eligibility Criteria
We welcome students from every domain to take this opportunity to learn about geological mapping and take their career forwards in it. This course doesn't need any prior knowledge and can be helpful in his/her current stream of studies.
